name: Robert V.
text: I'm leaving with no regrets, I know that's far from being the case for you.

name: Earch
text: Any specific regrets you'd like to express ?

name: Chris
text: Only one... But I won't find my answer anywhere around here...

name: Earch
text: Let's carry on then, and put the pieces back together again.

name: Chris
text: (He leaves with no regrets... And I've joined him in his leaving... ?)
